com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Class SCUIURIContextRuleResolverAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web.SCUIURIContextRuleResolverAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCUIInputValidationAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SCUIImplParamValueValidationAdapter

    public abstract class SCUIURIContextRuleResolverAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISCUIInputValidationAdapter
    This adapter finds validation rules for a particular parameter based on following rules -
    • This adapter first looks for all the rules defined in the context of current request URI.
      • If rules are found for passed name, those rules along with global rules are returned.
      • If no rules are registered for the passed name, global rules returned.
      • If no global rules are registered default rules returned.
    • If no rules are defined in the context of current the URI, adapter searches the rules which are defined without any URI context. Following criteria determines rules returned -
      • If rules are found for passed name, those rules along with global rules are returned.
      • If no rules are registered for the passed name, global rules returned.
      • If no global rules are registered, default rules returned.

    This is an abstract class and implementing should implement #getInputType() method.

    asmishra

      • getValidationRules

        public java.util.ArrayList<ISCValidationRule> getValidationRules(java.lang.String name,
                                                                 SCValidator validator,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Description copied from interface: ISCUIInputValidationAdapter
        This method should return the compiled list of validation rules which should be applied on a input.

        This method should never return null value, instead it should return an empty array list.

        Note: The request object passed in the method is unsafe, and no validation will occur if methods are called on this unsafe request. name name of the input validator instance of SCValidator request unsafe request response response list containing validation rules

        Specified by:
        getValidationRules in interface ISCUIInputValidationAdapter

      • getURISpecificRules

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ISCValidationRule> getURISpecificRules(java.lang.String name,
                                                                     SCValidator validator,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Returns all the rules applicable to passed input name. The method returns only those rules which were registered in the context of current request URI.

        This method does not return any rule which was not defined in the context of current URI.

        This method never returns null value.

        name name of the input validator validator instance request HTTP request response HTTP response list of the rules.

      • getBasicRules

        protected java.util.ArrayList<ISCValidationRule> getBasicRules(java.lang.String name,
                                                               SCValidator validator,
                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Returns all the rules applicable to passed input name. The method returns only those rules which were NOT registered in the context of any request URIs (ie. which are applicable to all request URIs).

        This method never returns null value.

        name name of the input validator validator instance request HTTP request response HTTP response list of the rules.
